query:
query getWardrobeShutterDesigns($moduleId: Int!, $categoryId: Int, $subCategoryId: Int, $dimension: String, $cityId: Int!) {
  getWardrobeShutterDesigns(moduleId: $moduleId, categoryId: $categoryId, subCategoryId: $subCategoryId, dimension: $dimension, cityId: $cityId) {
    __typename
    finishCategory
    finishType
    finishSubType
    designName
    shutterImage
    wardrobeShutterType
    shutterData {
      id
      name
      applicableSection
      designID
      designName
      subDesignID
      subDesignName
      hasHandle
      __typename
    }
    familyIds
  }
}
